articles.description: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra shared how they marked their first Father's Day with 6-month-old daughter Malti Marie Chopra Jonas.
articles.content: In addition to his own family, Nick is uncle to Kevin and Danielle Jonas' daughters Alena, 8, and Valentina, 5, as well as Joe Jonas and his wife Sophie Turner's daughter Willa, 23 months. Sophie and… [+701 chars]
